entries.seo_title: Bakalr Hair - Premium Virgin Hair Extensions | Bakalr Boutique

data.name: Bakalr Hair
data.description: Bakalr Hair is our signature house brand offering premium virgin human hair extensions. We source directly from ethical suppliers in Vietnam, Brazil, Cambodia, and India. Every bundle is quality-tested, cuticle-aligned, and backed by our satisfaction guarantee.
data.short_description: Our signature premium virgin hair brand

data.name: UNice Hair
data.description: UNice Hair is a leading global hair brand known for high-quality virgin and Remy human hair. With millions of customers worldwide, UNice offers a wide range of textures, lengths, and wig styles at accessible price points.
data.short_description: Global leader in virgin human hair

data.name: Beauty Forever
data.description: Beauty Forever specializes in 100% virgin human hair extensions and wigs. Known for their consistent quality, thick bundles, and extensive color options including pre-colored blonde and burgundy hair.
data.short_description: Quality virgin hair with color options

data.name: ISEE Hair
data.description: ISEE Hair is a trusted name in the hair industry, offering premium virgin human hair bundles, closures, and wigs. Known for their exceptional customer service and quality guarantee.
data.short_description: Premium virgin hair with great service

data.name: Tinashe Hair
data.description: Tinashe Hair offers luxury-grade virgin human hair known for its silky texture and minimal shedding. Their HD lace wigs and frontals are particularly popular among influencers and professionals.

data.name: Nadula Hair
data.description: Nadula Hair is known for affordable luxury, offering high-quality virgin human hair at competitive prices. Their Brazilian and Malaysian hair collections are bestsellers.

data.name: EBIN New York
data.description: EBIN New York is the #1 name in wig adhesives and styling products. Their Wonder Lace Bond and edge control products are salon staples and bestsellers worldwide.

data.name: Bold Hold
data.description: Bold Hold revolutionized wig installation with their professional-grade adhesives and lace tints. Used by celebrity stylists and lace wig enthusiasts worldwide.

data.name: got2b
data.description: got2b by Schwarzkopf is famous for their Glued styling products, which have become essential for wig installation and edge control. The iconic yellow bottle is a beauty staple.

data.name: X-Pression
data.description: X-Pression is the world's leading braiding hair brand. Their Kanekalon braiding hair is lightweight, tangle-free, and available in every color imaginable.

data.name: FreeTress
data.description: FreeTress offers affordable synthetic hair for braids, twists, crochet styles, and wigs. Known for their realistic textures and wide variety of styles.

data.name: Outre
data.description: Outre offers innovative synthetic and human hair wigs, weaves, and braiding hair. Known for their trendy styles and collaborations with influencers.

data.name: Sensationnel
data.description: Sensationnel is a leader in synthetic hair innovation, known for their realistic textures like Cloud 9 Swiss Lace and Butta Lace wigs. Affordable glamour for everyone.

data.name: Cantu
data.description: Cantu Shea Butter is a beloved Black-owned hair care brand known for affordable, effective products for natural and textured hair. Their leave-in conditioner is an icon.

data.name: Mielle Organics
data.description: Mielle Organics is a Black woman-owned brand creating organic, natural hair care products. Their Rosemary Mint Oil went viral for promoting hair growth.

data.name: SheaMoisture
data.description: SheaMoisture offers premium natural hair care products made with ethically-sourced shea butter. A staple brand for natural hair care and protective styling.

data.name: Ardell
data.description: Ardell is the world's most recognized lash brand. From natural Wispies to dramatic magnetic lashes, Ardell has styles for every occasion.

data.name: BaBylissPRO
data.description: BaBylissPRO is the professional's choice for hair tools. Their flat irons, dryers, and curling irons are trusted by stylists worldwide for salon-quality results.

data.name: Andis
data.description: Andis is a legendary name in clippers and trimmers. Trusted by barbers for over 100 years, their T-Outliner is an industry standard for precision edging.

data.name: Wahl
data.description: Wahl Professional has been the choice of barbers and stylists since 1919. Known for powerful, reliable clippers and trimmers built to last.
